review: This is by far one of the best gadgets to get. I hate that my TV does not have those nice automatic buttons for Net Flix, etc. With Chrome, you never have to worry about that! I set this up in less than two minutes. I used both my iPhone and iPad to stream content. It worked beautifully. I love it! Best thing that I have bought in awhile!

review: I love my Chromecast. I never thought I would watch so much T.V, but now whenever I'm tired I just switch over to HDMI and watch some of The Office. I love how I can connect my computer monitor to my chromecast by the Chromecast plugin on Chrome. Great invention. Everyone should own one!
author: Luke

review: The descriptions make it seem like this little tool will suddenly allow you to stream all kinds of internet content onto the TV.  Not so! First my modem was not on their list, and then learned my modem is not compatible.  When I got a different modem, and went through torture to get it to work with this gadget, I found out it is not compatible with Amazon Prime Instant Video streaming!  Sheesh, guess I should have read the fine print before purchasing. Do not recommend.
author: SuMo
